statements: SELECT * FROM student_behavior
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_date FROM student_behavior
SELECT recommendation_type FROM student_behavior WHERE student_id = 123
SELECT * FROM student_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'Positive'
SELECT behavior_date, behavior_type, recommendation_type FROM student_behavior ORDER BY behavior_date DESC
SELECT student_id, behavior_type, behavior_date, recommendation_type FROM student_behavior WHERE behavior_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM student_behavior WHERE recommendation_type = 'Positive' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, recommendation_type FROM student_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'Disciplinary' ORDER BY student_id ASC, behavior_date ASC;
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(behavior_type) AS num_behaviors FROM student_behavior GROUP BY behavior_type HAVING COUNT(behavior_type) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM student_behavior ORDER BY behavior_type ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_level, average_score FROM student_profiles;
SELECT student_name, average_score, grade_level, student_id FROM student_profiles;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_description, log_id, log_timestamp, student_id FROM behavior_logs;
SELECT log_timestamp, student_id, behavior_description, behavior_type, log_id FROM behavior_logs;
SELECT grade_level, student_id, student_name FROM student_profiles;
SELECT * FROM student_profiles WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT student_name, average_score FROM student_profiles WHERE average_score >= 80;

SELECT student_name, behavior_description FROM student_profiles JOIN behavior_logs ON student_profiles.student_id = behavior_logs.student_id WHERE behavior_type = 'positive' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT student_name, behavior_description FROM student_profiles JOIN behavior_logs ON student_profiles.student_id = behavior_logs.student_id WHERE grade_level = 11 AND behavior_type = 'negative';
SELECT student_name, MAX(average_score) AS highest_score FROM student_profiles GROUP BY student_name ORDER BY highest_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE course_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT student_name, course_name, instructor_name FROM students JOIN student_courses ON students.student_id = student_courses.student_id JOIN courses ON student_courses.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE course_level = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY course_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, age, course_name FROM students JOIN student_courses ON students.student_id = student_courses.student_id JOIN courses ON student_courses.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE course_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level IN ('A', 'B') ORDER BY student_name ASC, grade_level DESC;

SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM student_courses JOIN courses ON student_courses.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING total_students > 2 ORDER BY total_students DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM students JOIN behaviors ON students.student_id = behaviors.student_id;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE credit_hours >= 3 ORDER BY course_name;
SELECT course_name, course_description, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE credit_hours BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, behaviors.behavior_type, behaviors.behavior_description FROM students JOIN behaviors ON students.student_id = behaviors.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, age FROM Students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, recommended_course_id FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, age FROM Students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_id, grade, age FROM Students WHERE grade >= 90 AND age BETWEEN 18 AND 22 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT student_id, recommended_course_id, recommendation_date FROM Recommendations WHERE student_id = 1001;
